Knight Statues can be found inside of the Hallowed Sepulchre. The player should avoid the spinning Saradomin sword that they throw. The sword will stop at a specific, marked tile and then return shortly after.

The colour of the sword indicates how quickly it will move.

Image Projectile Speed Floor
Saradomin sword Slow 1st & 2nd Floors
Gilded Saradomin sword Medium 3rd Floor
Ornate Saradomin sword Fast 4th & 5th Floors



Spinning Saradomin sword

'''Knight Statues''' can be found inside of the [[Hallowed Sepulchre]]. The player should avoid the spinning [[Saradomin sword]] that they throw. The sword will stop at a specific, marked tile and then return shortly after.

The colour of the sword indicates how quickly it will move.
